title: Malacatán Airport
text:
Malacatán Airport is an airport serving the town of <a href="Malacat%C3%A1n">Malacatán</a> in the <a href="San%20Marcos%20Department">San Marcos Department</a> of <a href="Guatemala">Guatemala</a>.
The runway is in the countryside west of the town. The Tapachula <a href="VOR-DME">VOR-DME</a> (Ident: TAP) is located southwest of the airport.
